title: Question about finding a summoner who is inactive

replies.body: I know you're eager for a name, but Kokua pretty much said it.  We won't be able to share info about other players or when a name would become available.  If you're using third party sites to check as well, it could be inaccurate.  Everyone gets an equal chances to claim a name, so we won't release a specific name to a player as well.  I know it's a tough game, sorry about that!
Unfortunate :( That's okay. I suppose I'll just have to claim that name in games going forward. Thanks summoners

Riot won't give you someone else's personal information, and they won't tell you how long until the name becomes available. You can read more about it [here.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914)
